biotools.summary: Cancer Gene and Pathway Explorer (CGPE) provides a highly integrated bioinformatics webserver for investigating, analyzing, and visualizing the TCGA and GEO gene expression data. CGPE provides key interactive and customizable analysis portal

bioschemas.name: CGPE
